resources.string: An application requires installation of Google Play services.

An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update the Android Wear app."
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.

The certificate is invalid or inaccessible.
The server responded with an error. Check your username and password, then try again.
TLS required but not supported by server.
"Couldn't open connection to server due to security error."
"You've typed an incorrect server address or the server requires a protocol version that Email doesn't support."
"You don't have permission to sync with this server. Contact your server's administrator for more information."
The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device. Do you want to finish setting up this account?
"This server requires security features that your Android device doesn't support, including: %s"
"WARNING: Deactivating the Email app's authority to administer your device will delete all email accounts that require it, along with their email, contacts, calendar events and other data."
%s requires you to update your security settings.
"Account \"%s\" can't be synced due to security requirements."
Account \"%s\" has changed its security settings; no user action is required.
The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device.
\"%s\" requires you to change your lock-screen PIN or password.
Your lock-screen PIN or password has expired.
You need to change your lock screen PIN or password soon or the data for %s will be erased. Do you want to change it now?
The data for %s is being erased from your device. You can restore it by changing your lock screen PIN or password. Do you want to change it now?

Select server sent items folder for %s
"● Increased security for Gmail accounts ● Easier account setup flow ● Printing ● Other bug fixes"
"Be careful with this message. Similar messages have been used to steal people's personal information. Unless you trust the sender, don't click on links or reply with personal information."

"Be careful with this message. It contains a suspicious link that has been used to steal people's personal information. Unless you trust the sender, don't click on links or reply with personal information."
Be careful with this message. It might contain a virus or a malicious link.
"Be careful with this message. The sender's account may be compromised, so this message could be a scam to steal personal information."
Be careful with this message. This message may not have been sent by: %1$s.
"Why is this message in Spam? We've found that lots of messages from %2$s are spam."
"Why is this message in Spam? We've found that lots of messages from %2$s are spam."
"Why is this message in Spam? You've tried to unsubscribe from this sender but they've continued to send you emails, so new messages are put directly into Spam to keep them out of your inbox."
"Why is this message in Spam? You've tried to unsubscribe from this sender but they didn't provide a way to do that, so new messages are put directly into Spam to keep them out of your inbox."
"Be careful with this message. It contains content that's generally used to steal personal information."
This message may not have been sent by: %1$s
"Be careful with this message. This message may not have been sent by: %1$s. Similar messages have been used to steal people's personal information."
This message was not sent to Spam because of a filter you created.
"Be careful with this message. Our systems couldn't verify that this message was really sent by %2$s. You might want to avoid clicking on links or replying with personal information."
"Why is this message in Spam? You've previously marked messages from %1$s as spam."
Why is this message in Spam? You clicked Report spam for this message.
Why is this message in Spam? You clicked Report phishing for this message.
Why is this message in Spam? Your organisation has requested that messages like this be marked as spam.
"This message was not sent to Spam based on your organisation's request."
"Why is this message in Spam? It contains content that's typically used in spam messages."
"Why is this message in Spam? It's similar to messages that have been detected by our spam filters."
Be careful with this message. Many people have marked similar messages as spam.
Be careful with this message. Many people have marked similar messages as phishing scams, so this might contain unsafe content.
"Why is this message in Spam? We've found that lots of messages from %1$s are spam."
"Why is this message in Spam? It seems to be a fake bounce reply to a message that you didn't actually send."
"Why is this message in Spam? It's written in a different language to the one that you usually use."
"Why is this message in Spam? It's similar to messages that have been detected by our spam filters."
Why is this message in Spam? %1$s cannot reach you via your Google+ profile at this time.
Be careful with this message. Someone might be trying to trick you by using similar-looking characters (such as Σ and E) in the email addresses contained in this message.
Allows the app to read your Gmail.
Allows the app to modify your Gmail, including sending and deleting mail.
Allows the app to send Gmail messages without opening the Gmail app.
Allows the app to access information about your mail.
To use Gmail, you need a Google Account.
